title: La Camelia Vegan Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Spanish
description: Opened early-2015 by the owners of La Camelia sushi takeaway. In addition to vegetable sushi, this food bar also offers organic wine, juice, and cake; spreads and hummus; seitan, tofu, and tempeh with sweet and sour sauce umeboshi; and more. In the the center of Bilbao, close to the river and town hall, with plenty of seating.
